title.value: CHINA SOUTHERN RSP POSITION RESERVED AVAILABLE - A330/B777/B787 NTR

component.value: China Southern Airlines has published new policy for RSP position reservation. The Captains can choose the RSP base after he is qualified to join China Southern Airlines. And the company will reserve the position for him for 90 days.

1. If a pilot indicates to chooses Fast Track (FT), he can reserve an RSP position after he passes the ATPL, medical, and sim assessment and he is ready to join the company in three months. (calculated from the 1st day of the next month after he passes sim，ATPL, medical )
component.backupValue: 1. If a pilot indicates to chooses Fast Track (FT), he can reserve an RSP position after he passes the ATPL, medical, and sim assessment and he is ready to join the company in three months. (calculated from the 1st day of the next month after he passes sim，ATPL, medical )

component.value: 2. If a pilot indicates to chooses Normal Track (NT), he can reserve an RSP position after he passes the CAAC check and he is ready to join the company in three months. (calculated from the 1st day of the next month after he passes CAAC sim check )
component.backupValue: 2. If a pilot indicates to chooses Normal Track (NT), he can reserve an RSP position after he passes the CAAC check and he is ready to join the company in three months. (calculated from the 1st day of the next month after he passes CAAC sim check )

component.value: 3. If a pilot delays his indicated starting date for any reason, including documents preparation, he will lose his reserved RSP position, and will have to reapply for a position.
component.backupValue: 3. If a pilot delays his indicated starting date for any reason, including documents preparation, he will lose his reserved RSP position, and will have to reapply for a position.

title.value: Pilot is the Most Attractive Job in America, According to Tinder

component.value: So you're a speech language pathologist? That's really cool. But would you consider your profession…sexy? Not many people associate that career as hot as say, a nurse or a teacher. But according to Tinder, speech pathologists, or more specifically, female speech pathologist, get a ton of tail.

The dating app recently released some very enlightening data about which jobs listed in profiles get the most right swipes. Tinder finally added job and education integration to its service in November, and since then, it's been tracking the career fields that are getting all the action.

The top male jobs have few surprises: pilot is number one, with firefighter, doctor, model and teacher also at the top of the list. The female list, however, is full of surprises and diversity! Sure, people will probably always be into models and flight attendants, but physical therapists and interior designers are ranked even higher than those jobs!

title.value: Beijing Capital Airlines to partner China National Badminton Team - supporting in 2016 Rio Olympic Games in Brazil

component.value: Beijing Capital Airlines Co., Ltd. have agreed a strategic sponsorship partnership with China’s national badminton team. The signing ceremony took place in Beijing on January 19.
Li Yongbo, head coach of the Chinese national badminton team, alongside a roster of star players, including Lin Dan, Chen Long and Li Xuerui, were present at the ceremony.
Despite the fact that no details of the partnership were revealed, the deal means that Chinese badminton national teams will be backed by the Beijing-based airline in the 2016 Rio Olympic Games.

“Capital Airlines offer infinite support and passionate encouragement (to us). The Chinese national badminton team will now compete in the Rio Olympic Games in much higher spirits,” said Li Yongbo, “(We) will try our best to win more games and uphold the country’s honour.”

Beijing Capital Airlines is a joint venture founded by Hainan Airlines and Beijing Travel Group. The company currently has a sponsorship deal with Qingdao Badminton Club and it also sponsored the 2015 PGA China Tour.

component.value: Dear Captains, here is the interview preparation to join Chinese Airlines for your reference:
Documents to prepare for background investigation: (prepare the documents while waiting for the CAAC Sim)

1. NCR – Non Criminal Record.

  • Issued by local police department of home country
  • Notarized by Chinese Embassy
  • Translated into Chinese by authorized translation co. and sealed.
  • Only has 6 months validity which is from the date of issue to the date submit to CAAC office.
2. NAR – Non Accident & Incident Record.
  • Issued by current/previous employer airlines
  • Printed in company letterhead with the signature of leader and company seal
  • Clearly state in the employment time period, no accident record, punctuality in job and work attitude.
  • Translated into Chinese by authorized translation co. and sealed.
3. Recommendation Letter.
  • Issued by current/previous employer
  • Translated into Chinese by authorized translation co. and sealed.
4. Ratings and Flight Hours Certificate.
  • Issued by current/previous employer airlines
  • Printed in company letterhead with the signature of leader and company seal
  • Clearly state the Airline Transport Pilot License, Ratings and Flight Hours.
  • Translated into Chinese by authorized translation co. and sealed.
Waiting for Work Permit and Working Visa Invitation (Z Visa) from the airlines.

title.value: China Southern Airlines: South Air sees annual net profit up 110-130%

component.value: China Southern Airlines (01055) said it expects net profits attributable to equity holders for year 2015 to increase by 110% to 130% as compared with the net profit of Rmb1.773 billion for the corresponding period last year. During 2015, the demand of Chinese civil aviation transportation market showed a strong trend, China Southern Airlines optimised resource allocation, enhanced the deployed capacity and seized the market opportunities, so that its operating revenue recorded an increase as compared with the corresponding period in the previous year. The preliminary results of strategic transformation of China Southern Airlines were achieved with Guangzhou hub has been gradually improved, and the international route has become a new profit growth point which was driven by the substantial growth of outbound tourism. The comprehensive budget management of China Southern Airlines highlighted its role with the continuous improvement in the company's cost control capability, so that its cost decreased as compared with the corresponding period in the previous year. Benefit from the fluctuation of the international crude oil price at a lower level, its cost of jet fuel price has been substantially decreased as compared with the corresponding period in the previous year. China Southern Airlines took the initiative to deal with the sharp depreciation of Renminbi and substantially reduced debt ratio denominated in US dollars, therefore reduced the exchange losses from the depreciation of Renminbi.
China Southern is recruiting A330 B777 B787 (NTR) Captains, Melbourne, Brisbane, Sydney, Amsterdam, Vancouver bases are available.

title.value: Okay Airways Has Started Its Second Scheduled Service to Japan with the Launch on 15 January Flights From TSN to KIX - B737 Captain Wanted

component.value: Okay Airways has started its second scheduled service to Japan with the launch on 15 January of weekly (Friday) flights from Tianjin (TSN) to Osaka Kansai (KIX). The 1,674-kilometre route will be operated by the airline’s 737-800s, with the frequency set to increase to twice-weekly from the end of the month with the addition of a Tuesday service.

Salary: up to 280000 USD/year (net)

Base: Beijing, Tianjin, Changsha

Working patterns: 9/3, 6/2, 36-day-off/year

Contract terms: 3 years or 5 years, renewable

800+ hours PIC on B737 EFIS or NG(EFIS transition training for NG by Okay Airlines);
5000+ hours total time;
Valid/current Class A (First Class) Medical;
No history of incidents or accidents; No crimical history;
ICAO level 4 (or equivalent) English proficiency;
No limitations on ATP and/or type rating;
Maximum age: 55

blogPosts.title: Okay Airways Has Started Its Second Scheduled Service to Japan with the Launch on 15 January Flights From TSN to KIX - B737 Captain Wanted
blogPosts.blurb: Okay Airways has started its second scheduled service to Japan with the launch on 15 January of weekly (Friday) flights from Tianjin (TSN) to Osaka Kansai (KIX). The 1,674-kilometre route will be operated by the airline’s 737-800s, with the frequency set to...
